attributes.title: tried to steal my money???
attributes.review:
oh my god i got this app to see why people kept talking about it, and it kept asking me for incredibly personal information! (ssn, email passwords, etc!!!) i think this app is trying to hack into my bank account!!!!! DO NOT GET THIS APP, IT WILL TRY TO STEAL YOUR IDENTITY!!!!! i also got a pop up ad that said if i don’t vote for trump then i’m a worthless piece of trash!! what kind of president would do such a thing??????? I WISH I COULD GIVE THIS ZERO STARS!! 

also, remember that Black Lives Matter, and also ACAB ;)

attributes.title: Disgusted🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: Literally such a bad app!!! I downloaded it out of pure ignorance to see what the hype was about, turns out it was some fat and orange man who hides in bunkers. This app is not helpful I did not get anything out of it, this app is utterly useless!!!! Literally I’d rather download a 10 hour version of despacito on repeat. Could someone please explain to me how this app is helpful and what pertinent information will I get out it? I think apple should delete this app for misleading information. I’m so angry🤬

attributes.title: ugly fat cheeto man
attributes.review: do not download this app🙅🏽‍♀️ i almost got sent to the hospital because my eyes were burning so much😔i then proceeded to show my pet fish and it drowned . (IT DROWNED BECAUSE IT SAW THE UGLY CHEETO LOOKING RAPIST MAN CHILD MOLESTER RACIST) i then proceeded to keep looking and saw a picture of him tanning🤮 why does he need to tan if he’s already orange 🍊 i was so traumatized but i still kept going i saw this thing that looked liked spongebob without water it was so tiny tho 🤏🏽 DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP RAN BY A RACIST HOMOPHOBIC CHEETO! thats why he has no flavor and why hot cheetos will always be superior.

attributes.title: Worse than tumblr
attributes.review: So we all know about tumblr banning porn a while back due to the child pornography but HOLY S\*¥ this app. The moment I opened it I was met with the face of a known child predator promotion the app... WHAT?!? Since when do PEDOPHILES get to be anywhere but prison?!?! I was honestly too scared of what I may find if I looked in further & based on other reviews I’m happy I didn’t. This is a black market app used for the making and distribution of CHILD PORNOGRAPHY & is disguised as a political app. APPLE TAKE IT DOWN!!!

attributes.title: horrible!!
attributes.review: wouldn’t recommend getting this app at all. i downloaded this app to show my love and support to the donald trump himself and there has never been a time i regretted downloading anything this much in my life. right when i opened the app there were negative homophobic, transphobic, racist, and more comments. shouldn’t our president be spreading equality and love for our citizens ? instead of putting them against each other and being racist towards the races other than white? i decided to go more into the app and i came across a lewd picture of donald himself and my mom was laying right next to me and right when i came across this picture she had a seizure!! immediately deleted this app right after ! stay safe guys don’t trust this.

This is the worst app for fast food delivery that I have downloaded yet🤢. From the short time that I have spent on this app it seams that there are in fact no restaurants to order from, just one delivery driver on the opening screen that looks someone that would care more about the economy than the people he’s serving🤮. The only way that I can describe it is like a fat pig that got a really bad spray tan, don’t order food from this app he will probably drug the food.🤢🤮🤢🤮🤢

attributes.title: one word.  disgusting.
attributes.review: My day was completely and utterly ruined when I opened this app to see such a disturbing image.  Children will see this.  These children will have nightmares due to such a horrendous sight. I, myself, will have nightmares.  It truly saddens me that there are people in this world, cruel enough to let this happen and cruel enough to disturb our youth like that.  This app needs to be deleted immediately before anymore permanent damage is done to the future generations of our planet.

attributes.title: Horrible horrible app!!!
attributes.review: This is the worst app I've ever used it made my dog think he is a dinosaur and my dad now thinks he's a dog. I can't get them under control my dad has been running around the house on all fours and barking at me and my family, we had to call animal control but they didn't do anything because my dog thinks he is a dinosaur and ate them. This app also MAKES me sign in or make an account. It could easily be stealing my info as I'm writing this review so BEWARE!!! DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: just no ❤️
attributes.review: when i first opened the app it caused me trauma. looking at a rotten cheeto made me lose my soul. i then had to jump off the white house since i couldn’t take the pain away. when i showed my sister it caused her nightmares and then sudden death. she will now be roaming the halls of the white house getting her revenge. i talked to my fridge about this and he thinks it’s the best to leave this review. i choked on my water and drowned because of this app. i showed my dog and he ran away so i had to use lighting speed to catch him when i saw that everyone turned into a cheeto. their cheeto dust was falling off and i didn’t wanna turn into one so i transported back home. i really don’t recommend downloading this app unless u want to die which is why i did 🧚🏻‍♀️✨💕

attributes.title: Absolutely HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I wanted to be more interactive with my political views so i downloaded this app to keep up with trump. AS SOON as i opened the app I saw MULTIPLE pictures of a naked trump, MIND YOU i was with my 60 year old grandma. It was absolutely terrible that she passed out and we had to take her to the hospital. As soon as she woke up she was screaming “ HELP TRUMP IS TRYING TO KILL ME “ turns out because she had seen the pictures first her mind was taken over by him. PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD OR YOU COULD GO INTO SHOCK AND DIE. thank you for listening 🥂
